user.title: Connect Yandex Disk
user.description:
Enter your Yandex Disk OAuth token to enable backup integration.

To get your OAuth token:
1. Visit https://oauth.yandex.com/authorize?response_type=token&client_id=<YOUR_APP_ID>
2. Authorize the application
3. Copy the access_token from the redirect URL
4. Paste it below

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Yandex Disk
reauth_confirm.description: Your Yandex Disk OAuth token is invalid or has expired. Please enter a new token.
